basics.name: Kevin Maldonado
basics.label: Machine Learning Engineer
basics.summary: I'm good at doing math and writing high quality software, specialized in Machine Learning (Natural Language Processing in particular)

work.name: ASAPP
work.summary: LLM models for text classification, automatic suggestions and retrieval augmented generation in customer care products.

work.name: BrightSector Algorithms
work.summary: Designed and developed Natural Language Processing systems for MercadoLibre's search engine (the largest online marketplace in Latin America), handling +1M requests per minute in <5ms

work.name: La Plata National University
work.summary: I helped a physician on his post-doctoral thesis. We analyzed the electrical activity of the heart via the ECG/VCG signal and tried to improve the treatment of arrhythmia and the indication of resynchronization therapy. I collaborated with the development of the software for the signal processing and the data analysis.

volunteer.summary: Project Manager and waterpolo lead for the organization of IGLA 2024 Buenos Aires, the international LGBT+ aquatic sports championship.

I helped in the overall organization of the event, led the discussion about the solutions of the problems of the competition, gave interactive talks about geometry to kids from 10 to 12 years old and organized recreative activities for them.

awards.title: Third Accessit in the Mathematical Modeling Contest 2022
awards.summary: Used an information theory approach to solve a probability problem about the UEFA Champions League's knockout phase draw

awards.title: First place in the Top Coder Open 2019 - South America Regionals - Development track
Programming contest
awards.summary: I participated in the Argentinian Tournament of Programming from 2015 to 2018 and got the third place in 2018, and the ICPC regionals the same years.
